title: Investor’s guide: Prerequisite for smart investing
text: Investor’s guide: Prerequisite for smart investing 19 Jul 2015, 7:29PM IST Copy URL Embed Watch the video to know the prerequisites of smart investing through investment applications available on smart phones. Krishna Kumar takes you through some of these apps and their application for smart investment. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes 67 views
